title: Instructional Design for International Virtual Exchange Programs: Autoethnography-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of online learning and basic intercultural communication
context.additional_context: Strengthening educational design competencies for multicultural environments in response to post-COVID-19 needs for expanded non-face-to-face international exchanges

learning_goals: Learners can complete PBL projects in collaboration with multicultural team members.
Learners record intercultural educational experiences in reflective reports using autoethnography techniques.
Learners conduct at least three international collaborative workshops using online collaboration tools (e.g., Zoom, Padlet).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
